===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|尸|吊|ls=i|c1=body|c2=hanging}}: “something that hangs from the body”.

===Etymology===
Derived from {{zh-l|*鳥|bird}}. Words for "bird" are commonly used to denote the genitalia in Chinese.
